definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
Dramatized history of successive dynasties (from Han to Republican China) by Cai Dongfan 蔡東藩|蔡东藩
pinyin: li4 chao2 tong1 su2 yan3 yi4

definition: Dramatized history of Republican China until 1927 by Cai Dongfan 蔡東藩|蔡东藩, and later chapters by Xu Qinfu 許廑父|许廑父
pinyin: Min2 guo2 tong1 su2 yan3 yi4

sentences.english: Accessibly several different versions, oriented to different circle of tasks.
sentences.chinese: 通俗易懂的幾個不同版本，面向不同圈子的任務。

sentences.english: The following appeared in an article from a popular newsmagazine.
sentences.chinese: 下述文字摘自某通俗時事雜誌的一篇文章。

sentences.english: "Look before you leap" is a familiar expression.
sentences.chinese: 三思而行是一個很通俗的說法。

sentences.english: The BBC denies that its broadcasting has been dumbed down.
sentences.chinese: 英國廣播公司否認爲了使廣播通俗易懂而降低水準。

sentences.english: We have books that are very interesting, that are very accessible.
sentences.chinese: 生動有趣，通俗易懂的書籍。

sentences.english: Political pop has a new face in Yin Kun' s oils.
sentences.chinese: 政治通俗畫在尹坤的油畫中呈現出新的面貌。

sentences.english: Do you like reading classics or popular novels?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡閱讀古典作品還是通俗小說？

sentences.english: The style Shelley is using here is that of popular lampoon .
sentences.chinese: 這裏雪萊用的是通俗的嘲諷手法。

sentences.english: Detective story is one kind of popular light literatures in Chinese contemporary society.
sentences.chinese: 偵探小說是當代中國流行的通俗文學品種。

sentences.english: The book was written in very simple, jargon-free language.
sentences.chinese: 這本書是寫的很簡單，通俗的免費語言。

sentences.english: Movie and TV, as a whole, have close relation to the popular art in the aspect of popularity.
sentences.chinese: 電影和電視的通俗性與文藝的大衆性相關聯。

sentences.english: Using Chinese present popular wording that is to remould one ' s subjective world.
sentences.chinese: 用中國現代通俗的話說是改造自己的主觀世界。

sentences.english: we’d see men and women equally sexually objectified in popular culture.
sentences.chinese: 那麼在通俗文化中男人女人同樣都被性物化。

sentences.english: The True Story of Ah Q combines solemnity and popularity as a model.
sentences.chinese: 阿q正傳》是嚴肅性與通俗性相統一的典範。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:That pop-song had a great vogue at one time.
sentences.chinese: 那首通俗歌曲有一陣子非常流行。

sentences.english: All configuration options are worded simple.
sentences.chinese: 所有系統設置說明通俗易懂。

definition: in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
in a nutshell/to put it briefly
